subject: Update documentation for Options Overview and Compare Mode features
body:
- BUSINESS_GUIDE.md: Add complete sections for Options Overview and Compare Mode
  - Document model cards, quick comparison table, and view mode toggle
  - Document saving options, managing saved options, comparing options
  - Document export/import functionality and storage limits
  - Update FAQ to reflect new export capabilities

- UI_UX_GUIDE.md: Add UI documentation with ASCII diagrams
  - Options Overview section with layout and responsive design
  - Compare Mode section with save modal, manager panel, and comparison view
  - Update Future Enhancements (remove implemented features)
  - Add Version 2.5 changelog entry

- README.md: Add new features to Key Features list

- IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md: Add session notes documenting progress
  - Mark all three implementation phases as complete
  - Document remaining optional enhancements
